engine.rendering

Class RenderTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.RenderTarget

  • public class RenderTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a location that can be rendered to by a particular IRenderDevice
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device, int width, int height, int texId)
      Creates a new render target.
      RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device, int width, int height, int texId, int fbo)
      Creates a new render target based on an existing target in the device.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderTarget

        public RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device,
            int width,
            int height,
            int texId)
        Creates a new render target.
        Parameters:
        device - The device rendering to this target.
        width - The width of the render target.
        height - The height of the render target.
        texId - The integer id of the texture being rendered to in the device.

      • RenderTarget

        public RenderTarget(IRenderDevice device,
            int width,
            int height,
            int texId,
            int fbo)
        Creates a new render target based on an existing target in the device.
        Parameters:
        device - The device rendering to this target.
        width - The width of the render target.
        height - The height of the render target.
        texId - The integer id of the texture being rendered to in the device.
        fbo - The integer id of the render target already existing on the device.

        public void clear(Color color)

      • drawRect

        public void drawRect(int texId,
            IRenderDevice.BlendMode mode,
            double startX,
            double startY,
            double endX,
            double endY,
            double texStartX,
            double texStartY,
            double texEndX,
            double texEndY,
            Color c,
            double transparency)
        Produces a rendering effect within a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        texId - The integer identifying the texture being used for rendering.
        mode - The blend mode being used
        startX - The start location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        startY - The start location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endX - The end location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endY - The end location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        texStartX - The location in the image on X where pixels should begin being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texStartY - The location in the image on Y where pixels should begin being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texEndX - The location in the image on X where pixels should finish being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texEndY - The location in the image on Y where pixels should finish being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        c - The color masking everything.
        transparency - The amount of transparency being used.
